item.title: Setting up a JavaScript project in 2017
item.description: Creating a front-end JavaScript project can be a daunting task due to the sheer volume of choices available while deciding the tech stack. First, you need to decide the JavaScript framework or library for your project. Do you plan to use the latest ES2015 language features in your code? If yes, then you need a transpiler because your browser probably doesnâ€™t support them yet. Then you require a bundling tool to get your code loaded in the browser.
